question:
It was reported in media that eighteen Indian institutions are part of South Asian Nitrogen Hub to study nitrogen pollution. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Nitrogen particles make up the largest fraction of PM2.5
  2. Nitrogen adds mass to air and helps in maintaining atmospheric pressure
  3. Nitrous oxide (N2O) is 300 times less potent than carbon dioxide
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Nitrogen particles make up the largest fraction of PM2.5.Nitrogen is considered “reactive”, and may pollute and even exert a potent greenhouse gas effect. Nitrous oxide (N2O) is 300 times more potent than carbon dioxide.
